original_text: and they turned aside there, to go in and spend the night at Gibeah. And he went in and sat down in the open square of the city, for no one took them into his house to spend the night.
korean_text: 기브아에 가서 유숙하려고 그리로 돌아 들어가서 성읍 넓은 거리에 앉아 있으나 그를 집으로 영접하여 유숙하게 하는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: to go in and spend the night at Gibeah.
and sat down in the open square of the city,
for no one took them into his house
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들을 자기 집으로 맞아들이지 않았습니다.
